heading: What does the WeSendit  token do for you?
content: If you pay with our token, you will receive up to a 60% discount on the following services:

contentData.heading: Your data transfer, your design, your URL
contentData.content: Use your company's corporate identity for data transfer with WeSendit. Define your own URL and turn your website into another marketing channel

contentData.heading: Wallpaper advertising
contentData.content: Use our Ad Manager to place wallpaper ads (2560x1440px) in your country or  region and reach hundreds of thousands  of WeSendit users with your business

contentData.heading: Premium Services
contentData.content: As a Business or Premium user,  you enjoy valuable security features.  They guarantee the authenticity and integrity  of sensitive company data. With the new WeSendit 3.0, you get unlimited file transfer  and storage capabilities. Still,  you can also time-stamp your  data via publicly verifiable proof  and share it with your customers  or co-workers via the,  decentralized network you define.
